main.name: Kashish Singh
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Kashish! Welcome to my Portfolio. I've been coding for some time now. As a Full Stack Developer I've worked on various projects. I usually work with ReactJs , ExpressJs , NodeJs , POSTGRESQL , MONGODB . I'm passionate towards learning new skills and frameworks. I have worked on and deliverd projects , which have transformed me into a better team player and have also improved my individual efficiency. I can work under pressure as well and produce results with deadlines. I am eager to find a team and an Organization to which I can add some value to .
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for Collaboration / Job Offers

resume.skillmessage: My Programming Language Proficiency with Google

education.description: Currently in Senior Year of College.

testimonials.text: Kashish is absolutely excellent, his depth and thirst of knowledge is simply great... I would definitely recommend him.
Learning and working on new tech with Kashish has been AWESOME, he's really approachable , patient , is a great listener as well.
